definition[0]: to look angrily at someone for a long time
example[1]: He glared round the room as if expecting a challenge.
definition[1]: to shine with a very strong bright light which hurts your eyes
example[2]: The sun glared down on us.
definition[2]: a bright unpleasant light which hurts your eyes
example[3]: a special screen to reduce glare
example[4]: the harsh glare of the desert sun
example[5]: She gave him a hostile glare.
